trans-unit.source: Specifies whether <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> objects refer to the debug or release version of client scripts.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref> oggetti si riferiscono alla versione di debug o release di script client.

trans-unit.source: The ScriptMode enumerator provides values for setting which version of client script to use on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: L'enumeratore ScriptMode fornisce valori per l'impostazione versione dello script client da utilizzare in una pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator values can be applied to either the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> object, or to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.ScriptMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object.
trans-unit.target: I valori dell'enumeratore possono essere applicati al <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>oggetto, o il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.ScriptMode%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.ScriptMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> object sets the version for all scripts on the page unless it is overridden by a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>oggetto imposta la versione per tutti gli script nella pagina, a meno che non venga sottoposto a override da un <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object sets the version for a particular script.
trans-unit.target: L' <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>oggetto imposta la versione di uno script specifico.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>

trans-unit.source: The Auto value produces different results depending on whether it refers to a standalone script file or to a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Il valore Auto produce risultati diversi a seconda che faccia riferimento a un file di script autonomo o in un file di script incorporati come risorsa in un assembly.

trans-unit.source: A standalone script file is defined with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Un file script autonomo viene definito con la <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A>

trans-unit.source: An assembly reference must be accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Un riferimento all'assembly deve essere accessibili mediante il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The results for the Auto value are as follows: - When it is applied to a standalone script file where the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A> property is specified, the Auto value is equivalent to Release.
trans-unit.target: I risultati per il valore automatica sono i seguenti: - quando viene applicato a un file di script autonomo in cui il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A>proprietà viene specificata, il valore automatica è equivalente alla versione.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When it is applied to a script reference in an assembly, Auto is equivalent to Inherit.
trans-unit.target: -Quando viene applicato a un riferimento a script in un assembly, Auto è equivalente a eredita.

trans-unit.source: When only <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> is specified, it is used to reference the script.
trans-unit.target: Quando una sola <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>viene specificato, viene utilizzato per fare riferimento a script.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A> property are both specified, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A> property is used instead of <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>, but the Auto value is still equivalent to Inherit.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A>proprietà sono entrambi specificati, il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A>proprietà viene usata invece di <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>, ma il valore automatico è sempre equivalente a Inherit.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: An error is thrown if the requested version of the script does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Se la versione richiesta dello script non esiste, viene generato un errore.

trans-unit.source: For instance, an error is thrown if a reference is made to a standalone script file that is named CustomScript.js and ScriptMode is set to Debug, but CustomScript.debug.js does not exist on the site.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, viene generato un errore se un riferimento a un file di script autonomo denominato CustomScript e ScriptMode è impostata su Debug, ma CustomScript.debug.js non esiste nel sito.

trans-unit.source: References to scripts in an assembly return the release version if the debug version does not exist.
trans-unit.target: I riferimenti agli script in un assembly restituiscono la versione finale se la versione di debug non esiste.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the `retail` attribute of the [deployment](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dbcc2c62-3159-4a62-9f1e-8cfe3b8b09dc) element of the Machine.config file is set to `true`, the release versions of client scripts are used throughout the Web site.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando il `retail` attributo del [distribuzione](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dbcc2c62-3159-4a62-9f1e-8cfe3b8b09dc) del file Machine. config è impostato su `true`, le versioni finali di script client vengono utilizzate in tutto il sito Web.

trans-unit.source: The ScriptMode values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: I valori di ScriptMode il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>e <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>vengono ignorate.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control, the version of client scripts to use is determined at run time based on the application-level [<compilation>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7c319582-074a-4d2a-a787-03b9d4541c12) element of the Web.config file, unless it is overridden in an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"> </xref> controllo, la versione di script client da utilizzare è determinato in fase di esecuzione in base al livello di applicazione [ <compilazione> ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7c319582-074a-4d2a-a787-03b9d4541c12) elemento di Web. config file, a meno che non venga sottoposto a override in un'istanza del <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> control, when applied to a standalone script file, Auto is equivalent to Release.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref> di controllo, se applicato a un file script autonomo, Auto è equivalente alla versione.

trans-unit.source: When applied to a script reference in an assembly, Auto is equivalent to Inherit.
trans-unit.target: Se applicato a un riferimento a script in un assembly, Auto è equivalente a eredita.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control, the debug version of the client script is used on the Web page unless overridden in an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"> </xref> controllo, la versione di debug di script client viene utilizzato nella pagina Web, a meno che non viene sottoposto a override in un'istanza del <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> control, the debug version of the client script is used on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref> controllo, la versione di debug di script client viene utilizzato nella pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control, Inherit is equivalent to Auto.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"> </xref> controllo eredita equivale all'Auto.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode*> value from <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> determines which version of the client script to use.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref> (controllo), il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode*>valore <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"> </xref> determina la versione dello script client da utilizzare.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control, the release version of the client script is used on the Web page unless overridden by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.ScriptMode*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> instance to Debug.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"> </xref> controllo, la versione dello script client viene utilizzato nella pagina Web, a meno che non viene sottoposto a override impostando il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.ScriptMode*>proprietà di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref> istanza per eseguire il Debug.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.ScriptMode*>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> control, the release version of the client script is used on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref> controllo, la versione dello script client viene utilizzato nella pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
